abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews Maira Buhler and Matias Mariani documentary film I Touched All Your Stuff.
lead_paragraph: An American computer technician serving time in a Brazilian jail recounts his ill-fated obsession with a mysterious femme fatale who may or may not exist.

headline.main: Review: ‘I Touched All Your Stuff,’ a Documentary About a Technician’s Story
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘I Touched All Your Stuff,’ a Documentary About a Technician’s Story

snippet: An American computer technician serving time in a Brazilian jail recounts his ill-fated obsession with a mysterious femme fatale who may or may not exist.
